subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Patriots A.F.C. championship victory over the Colts three years ago, in which Coach Bill Belichick instructed his players to hit the Colts receivers hard every chance they had, inspired N.F.L. rule changes.
snippet: The Patriots A.F.C. championship victory over the Colts three years ago, in which Coach Bill Belichick instructed his players to hit the Colts receivers hard every chance they had, inspired N.F.L. rule changes.
